priorities: Without ethics, man has no future. This is to say, mankind without them cannot be itself. Ethics determine choices and actions and suggest difficult priorities.
mesIntro: “It usually takes me more than three weeks to prepare a good impromptu speech.” – Mark Twain
scopeOfApd: I saw in details while she saw in scope. Not seeing the scope is why I am here and she is not. I took each element separately and never looked to see that they never did fit together properly.
